custom_development.description: Custom development tasks added when customizations are required
custom_development.note: These tasks are dynamically added when user indicates customizations are needed in questionnaire

tasks.name: Custom Development - Requirements Documentation
tasks.description: Document detailed requirements for custom development work
tasks.description_es: Documentar requisitos detallados para el trabajo de desarrollo personalizado

tasks.name: Custom Development - Technical Design
tasks.description: Create technical design and architecture for custom modules and features
tasks.description_es: Crear diseño técnico y arquitectura para módulos y características personalizadas

tasks.name: Custom Module Development
tasks.description: Develop custom Odoo modules and features based on requirements. Hours allocated based on customization scope from questionnaire.
tasks.description_es: Desarrollar módulos y características personalizadas de Odoo basadas en requisitos. Horas asignadas según alcance de personalización del cuestionario.
tasks.note: Hours should be adjusted based on customization_scope from questionnaire

tasks.name: Custom Development - Unit Testing
tasks.description: Create and execute unit tests for custom code
tasks.description_es: Crear y ejecutar pruebas unitarias para código personalizado

tasks.name: Custom Development - Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test custom modules integration with standard Odoo functionality
tasks.description_es: Probar integración de módulos personalizados con funcionalidad estándar de Odoo

tasks.name: Custom Development - Documentation
tasks.description: Create technical and user documentation for custom features
tasks.description_es: Crear documentación técnica y de usuario para características personalizadas

tasks.name: Custom Development - Code Review & QA
tasks.name_es: Desarrollo Personalizado - Revisión de Código y QA
tasks.description: Code review and quality assurance for custom development
tasks.description_es: Revisión de código y aseguramiento de calidad para desarrollo personalizado
